contents.text: Thank you for calling Avast, your trusted security partner.
For help with Avast Antivirus products, press 1.
If you need assistance installing, updating, or scanning with Avast Antivirus, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to an antivirus specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to update my Avast Antivirus and run a quick system scan.
I need help installing Avast Antivirus and running a full system scan on my laptop.
I need to configure Avast Antivirus to download the latest virus-definition signatures and schedule a full-system deep scan.
I’m having trouble updating my Avast antivirus and would like someone to guide me through running a scan.
I’m struggling to update my antivirus definitions and run a complete system scan on my workstation.

contents.text: For subscription management and billing questions about Avast Antivirus, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I’d like to review my Avast subscription status and update my billing information.
I want to review my Avast subscription charges and renew my plan.
I’d like to update my Avast Antivirus subscription payment method and retrieve my most recent billing invoice.
I noticed a charge for Avast on my bank statement and need help reviewing my subscription payment details.
I’d like to update my payment details and verify the renewal date for my Avast subscription.

contents.text: For support with Avast SecureLine VPN and privacy services, press 2.
If you need help setting up or troubleshooting Avast SecureLine VPN, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a VPN support specialist.

navigationGoals: Please help me set up and troubleshoot Avast SecureLine VPN on my device.
I need assistance setting up Avast SecureLine VPN on my phone before I travel.
I’m experiencing connection failures with Avast SecureLine VPN on my laptop—please help me troubleshoot the OpenVPN protocol settings.
I just bought Avast SecureLine VPN and need assistance installing and configuring it on my computer.
I need guidance setting up Avast SecureLine VPN on my laptop to securely connect to my lab network.

contents.text: For account and privacy inquiries regarding our VPN services, press 2.
Please hold while we connect you to our privacy support team.

navigationGoals: I have questions about how Avast SecureLine VPN handles my account data and privacy.
I’d like to understand what connection data Avast SecureLine VPN collects and how it’s used.
I want to confirm Avast SecureLine’s no-logs policy and request deletion of my VPN usage metadata under GDPR.
I want to understand what personal data Avast SecureLine VPN collects and how it’s used.
I have questions about how my VPN usage data is stored and protected under Avast’s privacy policy.
